#include <iostream>
using namespace std;

int main() {
	while(1)
	{
		int n,m,carry=0;
		cin>>n>>m;
		if(n==0 && m==0)break;
		else
		{	
			int c=0,rem1,rem2;
			while(n || m)
			{
				rem1 = n%10;
				rem2=m%10;
				int temp=rem1+rem2+c;
				if(temp>=10)
				{
					carry++;
					c=temp/10;
				}
				n=n/10;m=m/10;
			}
			
			
		}
	if(carry && carry!=1)
	cout<<carry<<" carry operations."<<endl;	
	else if(carry==1)
		cout<<carry<<" carry operation."<<endl;	
	else
		cout<<"No carry operation."<<endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
